listings.comment: They were very patient with me and all of my questions and change requests in order to make my website and I also learned a lot about how Wordpress works and it’s advantages and disadvantages and how to work around it all. Great work on their part and thanks to them for being patient and helping me to create my blog website!

This website was not anywhere close to what I originally described and did not fit my needs whatsoever. The complete lack of attention to not only the website but revealing my private information on my website was a complete mishandling and destroyed my trust in this relationship. The website provided will not be of any use to my needs as a blogger and there was very little effort in changing or using the description and examples I provided. I cannot recommend working with this vendor.
The team managed to create an a website design faster than i expected them to finish. This was purely their design and i didn’t have to provide inputs as they are very professional
Ended up with exactly what I wanted. Sohan was very responsive and provided instructions in a variety of formats using videos, links, copy and zoom. Highly recommend.

Sohan Islam is an exceptional web developer whose works was actually more than I expected. The response was always quick and polite and always willing to do what was asked. I could not recommend more highly and if I have further work needed, I will be calling upon them again.
